title: Webhook Debugger & Logger
description: Powerful tool to test, debug, and log incoming webhooks in real-time.

section_urls.title: üåê Dynamic Endpoint Setup
section_urls.sectionDescription: Quickly create unique, temporary endpoints to capture incoming data from any source.

urlCount.title: Number of Endpoints
urlCount.description: How many unique webhook URLs to generate for this run (1-10). Default is 3.

retentionHours.title: Retention Window (Hours)
retentionHours.description: How long to keep your webhook URLs active and data accessible before auto-deletion (1-72 hrs).

section_limits.title: üõ°Ô∏è Traffic & Payload Controls
section_limits.sectionDescription: Protect your Actor from traffic spikes by defining payload and parsing limits.

maxPayloadSize.title: Max Body Size (Bytes)
maxPayloadSize.description: Maximum allowed size for the incoming request body. Defaults to 10MB. Requests exceeding this will be rejected with 413.

enableJSONParsing.title: Auto-Parse JSON Payloads
enableJSONParsing.description: If enabled, the Actor will automatically convert 'application/json' bodies into searchable dataset objects.

section_v2_security.title: üîë Enterprise-Grade Security
section_v2_security.sectionDescription: Secure your endpoints with API keys, IP whitelisting, and automated data masking.

maskSensitiveData.title: Mask Authentication Headers
maskSensitiveData.description: Automatically redact 'Authorization' and 'Cookie' headers from logs to ensure compliance and privacy.

rateLimitPerMinute.title: Management Rate Limit
rateLimitPerMinute.description: Maximum requests per minute for management endpoints (/logs, /info, /replay). Applied per client IP.

authKey.title: Global API Key
authKey.description: Secure all incoming requests. Senders must provide this key via 'Authorization: Bearer' or '?key='.

allowedIps.title: IP Whitelist (CIDR)
allowedIps.description: Only accept traffic from these specific IPs or CIDR blocks. Leave blank for public access.

section_v2_response.title: üé≠ API Mocking & Latency
section_v2_response.sectionDescription: Simulate real-world API behaviors by customizing the responses sent back to the source.

defaultResponseCode.title: HTTP Status Code
defaultResponseCode.description: Default code to return (200, 201, etc). Use the '__status' query on webhooks to override dynamically.

defaultResponseBody.title: Custom Body Payload
defaultResponseBody.description: The exact data to return to the sender. Supports JSON, XML, or plain text strings.

defaultResponseHeaders.title: Custom HTTP Headers
defaultResponseHeaders.description: Define extra headers (e.g., {'X-Custom': 'Value'}) to include in EVERY webhook response.

responseDelayMs.title: Network Latency (ms)
responseDelayMs.description: Simulate slow internet or busy servers by delaying the response (0-10,000ms).

section_v2_workflows.title: üîÑ Smart Data Workflows
section_v2_workflows.sectionDescription: Trigger events and validate data immediately as it lands on your endpoints.

forwardUrl.title: Automated Pipe URL
forwardUrl.description: Immediately POST a copy of every captured request to this destination URL.

forwardHeaders.title: Pass Original Headers
forwardHeaders.description: If enabled, all incoming headers will be forwarded to the destination. Disable this to send a 'clean' request (Type/Length only).

jsonSchema.title: JSON Schema Guard
jsonSchema.description: Enforce strict payload structure. Invalid requests will be rejected with a 400 Bad Request.

customScript.title: Transformation Logic (JS)
customScript.description: JavaScript snippet to clean or transform the event before storage. Args: { event, req }.

testAndExit.title: Automated QA Mode
testAndExit.description: Internal test flag: enables immediate exit after healthy startup.
